CAREER.BODY: I'm a self taught software developer who managed to find his way into the industry. I've worked on some pretty badass projects so far and there's more to come. I genuinely love coding and would even go as far as considering it more of a hobby than just a job to me. Being a software developer means more to me than just the code. It's design, it's elegant, it's pretty.

SECONDHAND_CARD.BODY: I'm a secondhand shopping addict but at the same time a minimalist which is quite the conundrum. To solve this problem I run a secondhand Instagram store and hold occasional clothing markets to buy, sell, trade, and give away clothes that are often accompanied by a partayyy.
